events.name: Virtual Virtua Fighter York County Tourney
events.description: Join us and compete in Virtua Fighter 5 Ultimate Showdown, the recently enchanced remake of the 2006 original game.

events.name: Tamba Bay SMASH BROS. E-tourney
events.description: Join us virtually or locally in our Tamba Bay Smash Bros tournament. All players around the country are welcome!

events.name: Tekken 7 Charlotte Tournament
events.description: Compete and earn the top spot in our Tekken 7 Tournament! We will be hosting this tournament online, please register via link!
